body_html: Thanks for the detailed report @juraj-bicikl . This particular case is because the C++ function for shape inference for the Variable op is explicitly returning an unknown shape (state_ops.cc). That does seem fishy to me, I'll investigate further and get back to you.
body_text: Thanks for the detailed report @juraj-bicikl . This particular case is because the C++ function for shape inference for the Variable op is explicitly returning an unknown shape (state_ops.cc). That does seem fishy to me, I'll investigate further and get back to you.
body: Thanks for the detailed report @juraj-bicikl . This particular case is because the C++ function for shape inference for the Variable op is explicitly returning an unknown shape ([state_ops.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/d2c2d134dfc3e31f6d1296576f76e9abd4fc6c1c/tensorflow/core/ops/state_ops.cc#L31)). That does seem fishy to me, I'll investigate further and get back to you.
